name: S&P Games
description:
A game by Britney Coates and Paul McMonagle.

We built this over the course of a weekend (plus a few extra afternoons) for someone's birthday. The birthday girl works at a video game retail store, and this is how we interpret her life.

How to play:

  • Aim with the mouse, and click to throw a game.
  • Use WASD to run around the store.
  • Grab more games from the shelves if you run out.
  • Keep throwing until you see a little "heart" over the customer's head.
  • Don't let the customers get angry, or it's game over!
  • You can also throw shirts from the shirt rack!
  • (optional) add .ogg files to the Music folder if you'd like music while you play.
